wiki.summary: “Nobody’s Soldier” focuses on the experience of witnessing war and violence worldwide in the digital age, including the mental health strain of being exposed to others’ suffering and the frustration of feeling helpless or complicit. Hozier reacts to these feelings by rejecting the pressure to tacitly support war and expressing uncertainty over his own position and impact. wiki.content: “Nobody’s Soldier” focuses on the experience of witnessing war and violence worldwide in the digital age, including the mental health strain of being exposed to others’ suffering and the frustration of feeling helpless or complicit. Hozier reacts to these feelings by rejecting the pressure to tacitly support war and expressing uncertainty over his own position and impact. Hozier first teased the song in an interview on July 5, 2024, in which he said that he was planning to release a second EP of unreleased Unreal Unearth material featuring a song with “anti-war vibes.” A snippet of the track was surfaced online, featuring the chorus of the track together with the planned setlist for Lollapalooza. On August 1, 2024, Hozier posted a short video teasing the song on his social media, a few hours before performing the full song live as part of his Lollapalooza set; before the performance, he stated the song would be released in “a couple of weeks.” Read more on Last.fm.
